HomeMenu_SCENE_SupportContactPopup_Text_:
We appreciate your cooperation in providing
this information, which will help us investigate
and support you with any encountered issues.
�蚆ﾆIn some cases, the information below will be entered automatically.��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_LanguageOption_Text_2:
�蚆ﾆNote: The app will automatically restart��＀
�蚆ﾆafter changing your language.��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_LanguageOption_FinishedPo: Your language settings have been changed!
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_Notification_TimeZ: The start and end time must differ!
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_Notification_InfoP:
A notification will be sent 30 minutes
before your designated bedtime.

A notification will be sent when you
haven’t tracked any sleep sessions
for a while.

A notification will be sent when 
you’ve left a sleep research report
unreviewed for a while.

A notification will be sent when a
helper has gathered as many Berries
or ingredients as they can carry,
but you still haven’t collected them.

A notification will be sent when
you’re overdue to change sites.

A notification will be sent out when
your Good Camp Ticket’s effects
have ended.
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_Notification_Text:
�蚆ﾆOccasional notifications may be sent about events,
special campaigns, performance issues, etc.
Note: Even if you disable these notifications, you
may still receive messages that are deemed critical.��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_App_InfoPopup_Text:
This is a pop-up about the bonus gauge
that appears when a helper Pokémon
at max level receives Sleep EXP.

This pop-up will appear when research
EXP is automatically converted into
Dream Shards because the researcher
is already at the max research rank.
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_Others_Quality_Tex:
�蚆ﾆYou may be able to improve game performance and
reduce battery drain by lowering these settings.��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_Information_Text:
�蚆ﾆBy providing information about your gameplay,
you can help the developer improve the app.��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_SDKAgreePopup_Text_1:
In order to improve our service and provide
advertisements and information tailored to
players, Pokémon Sleep collects the
following types of information:
HomeMenu_SCENE_SDKAgreePopup_Text_4:
We would appreciate if you would agree to
this use of your data so that we can
improve the service we provide.
HomeMenu_SCENE_SDKAgreePopup_Text_5:
Even if you don’t agree, you’ll still be able
to use Pokémon Sleep.
HomeMenu_SCENE_SDKAgreeRebootPopup_Text_: Data sharing has been turned off.
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_AccountDelete_Text:
�蚆ﾆThis option will delete all data associated with
this account. It cannot be undone!��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_DeleteDialog_Text_:
If you delete your account, your data
will be permanently lost.
There will be no way to restore it.
Deletion may take up to 24 hours.

Deleting your account �毿Ｗwill not automatically��＀
�毿Ｗcancel your Premium Pass��＀. You must cancel it
through the store where you purchased it.

To cancel your plan, open the �毿ＷSettings��＀
application on your device, then select your
�毿ＷApple ID��＀, followed by �毿ＷSubscriptions��＀.

To cancel your plan, open the �毿ＷPlay Store��＀
application on your device, then tap your �毿Ｗprofile��＀
�毿Ｗicon��＀ in the upper-right corner. In the list, select
�毿ＷPayments & subscriptions��＀, then �毿ＷSubscriptions��＀.
HomeMenu_SCENE_Option_DeleteDialog_Confi:
Data associated with this account will
be permanently lost if you delete it.

�毿ＷThere will be no way to restore your data��＀
�毿Ｗfor any reason��＀.
Are you certain you want to continue?
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_Text:
By linking accounts, you will be able to carry over
your play data if you change devices.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_SuccessDia:
You’ve successfully
linked your Apple ID!

You’ve successfully linked your
Google Account!

You’ve successfully linked your
Facebook account!

When you start the app on a new
device, you can transfer your data
to it using the “Transfer Existing
Save Data” option.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_FailureDia:
We were not able to link this
profile to your Apple ID.

We were not able to link this profile
to your Google Account.

We were not able to link this profile
to your Facebook account.
The account could not be linked.

This account is already linked to a
different Pokémon Sleep profile.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_UnlinkDial: Would you like to unlink this account?
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_AppleUnlin:
Proceeding will remove
the link between this
profile and your Apple ID.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_GoogleUnli:
Proceeding will remove the
link between this profile
and your Google Account.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_FacebookUn:
Proceeding will remove the
link between this profile
and your Facebook account.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_UnlinkSucc:
The link to your Apple ID
has been removed.

The link to your Google Account
has been removed.

The link to your Facebook account
has been removed.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_UnlinkFail: We were unable to remove the link.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_PasswordDi:
Generating a Transfer Code makes it possible
to transfer your play data to another device.
To transfer data, you will need the �毿ＷTransfer��＀
�毿ＷCode ��＀issued here and your �毿ＷSupport ID��＀.

Do not share your Transfer Code with any
third party or otherwise make it public, as
you may later become unable to continue
playing using this play data.
�毿ＷBe sure to keep your Transfer Code private!��＀

You can generate new Transfer Codes as
needed. If you do, the previously generated
Transfer Code will become defunct.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkageFavorDialog:
If you link your account, you’ll be able to
recover your Pokémon Sleep data and continue
playing even if you change devices, delete the
app, or otherwise lose your data.

Also, if you link your account, you can claim
�毿Ｗ100 bonus diamonds��＀.
Note: This bonus only applies the first time
you link your account.

You can navigate to the Link Accounts screen
by tapping the Link Accounts button.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_PasswordCo:
�蚆ﾆDo not share your Transfer Code with any
third party or otherwise make it public, as
you may later become unable to continue
playing using this play data.
��＀�毿ＷBe sure to keep your Transfer Code private!��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_PasswordDi:
You will need both the Support ID and the
Transfer Code below to transfer your play
data to a different device.

Make sure to write them down, screenshot 
this page, or otherwise save this info!

The screenshot was
saved as an image!
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_PasswordRe:
You are about to generate a new Transfer
Code. Do you wish to continue?

�毿ＷRemember that your previously
generated Transfer Code will
no longer work once you do!��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_ReissueSuc: A new Transfer Code was generated!

Do not share your Transfer Code
with any third party or otherwise
make it public, as you may later
become unable to continue playing
using this play data. �毿ＷBe sure to keep��＀
�毿Ｗyour Transfer Code private!��＀
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_ReissueFai:
You can only generate a new
Transfer Code once per hour.
HomeMenu_SCENE_AccountLinkage_MessageToF:
If you are seeing this message, it means that
your account was linked only with Facebook.
As of February 29, 2024, �毿Ｗthe function to link
with Facebook has been discontinued��＀.
Please �毿Ｗlink to a different social media account
��＀or �毿Ｗgenerate a Transfer Code��＀.
ManualReportDescPopup_Desc:
Forgot to track your sleep?
You can enter the data manually!
ManualReportDescPopup_Section_Desc_1: You can’t do sleep research or receive the usual rewards, but you’ll get a �毿Ｗsmall reward��＀ for the first sleep session logged on a day.
ManualReportDescPopup_Section_Desc_2: �毿ＷPremium Pass subscribers��＀ will receive their bonus sleep points just as they would for tracking a sleep session normally.
ManualReportDescPopup_Section_Desc_3: No rewards will be given out for the second sleep session added in a given day.
ManualReportRegisterPopup_Desc:
You can enter data for times you
slept within the past 30 hours.
ManualReportConfirmPopup_Desc:
You cannot edit or delete sleep
sessions that you added manually.
ManualReportFinishPopup_Content_Title:
Your data has been added and
you received some rewards!
ManualReportFinishPopup_Content_Desc_2:
You’ll get �毿Ｗ�촀 Bonus �$BiscuitBiscuits촀��＀ (�毿Ｗone more than��＀
�毿Ｗusual��＀) from the next sleep session you
track after today!
ManualReportFinishPopup_Content_Desc_3:
However, if you track sleep for a second
time today and conduct sleep research, you
will not receive this extra Bonus Biscuit.
ManualReportFinishPopup_Content_Desc_NoR:
This is your second sleep session for
today, so you’ll receive no rewards.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_1:
You can only add sleep sessions that
fell within the past 30 hours.
Please check your sleep time.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_2_1:
The time that you said you went to
sleep falls after the time that you
said you woke up!
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_2_2:
The time that you said you woke up
falls before the time that you said
you went to sleep!
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_2_3:
You can’t add sleep sessions for a
time that’s still in the future.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_2_4:
If you want to add a sleep session,
it must be at least 90 minutes long.
Please check the data you entered.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_2_5:
If you want to add a sleep session,
it cannot be longer than 12 hours.
Please check the data you entered.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_3:
You can only track or add two sleep
sessions per day. You’ve already
reached your limit for today.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_4:
The times you’ve entered overlap with
another sleep session you’ve already
added or tracked, so this data can’t
be saved. Please check the times you
entered and try again.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_5:
This sleep session would fall before
one you’ve already added or tracked,
so it cannot be saved. Please check
the times you entered and try again.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_6:
Please check the data you’ve
entered and try again.
ManualReportErrorPopup_Text_7:
Before trying to manually add data,
please review any pending reports!
ManualReportNoBonusDescPopup_Message:
This will be your second set of sleep
data for today, so you won’t receive
the following rewards:
- Sleep points
- Pokémon energy recovery
- Pokémon EXP
ManualReportGPPNotificationPopup_Text:
If you have sleep data on your
Pokémon GO Plus + that you haven’t
yet reported, please synchronize with
your Pokémon GO Plus + first.
